METHOD.NAME: WebhookMovimento
METHOD.ACTIONSCRIPT:
SELECT:PEDV NM.CODIGO AS COD_MODELO, F.COD_FILIAL AS COD_FILIAL, NF.IDNFE AS NF_ID, NF.SERIE AS SERIE, NF.NUMERO_NOTA AS NOTA FROM PEDIDO_VENDA PV INNER JOIN PRODUTOS_EVENTOS PE ON PE.PEDIDO=PV.PEDIDOV INNER JOIN NF ON NF.NOTA =PE.NOTA INNER JOIN FILIAIS F ON F.FILIAL=NF.FILIAL INNER JOIN NF_MODELOS NM ON NM.NF_MODELO=NF.MODELO WHERE PV.PEDIDOV=:PEDIDOV;
#CALL WTSSYSTEM.HTTP.GET(URL='http://189.2.127.245:3355/api/millenium-pmz/notasIntegration/nota/'||#REPLACET(:PEDV.COD_MODELO)||'/'||#REPLACET(:PEDV.COD_FILIAL)||'/'||#REPLACET(:PEDV.NF_ID)||'/'||#REPLACET(:PEDV.SERIE)||'/'||#REPLACET(:PEDV.NOTA)||'',HEADERS='Authorization: Basic SU5URUdSQUNBTy1QTVo6NDk0ZTU0NDU0NzUyNDE0MzQxNGYyZDUwNGQ1YQ==' ) ;
